inn1.comm: ooh, appeared to nip back in there, lands on a good length outside off, gets outside the line to defend, gets an inside edge onto his pads
a touch too straight and he's off the mark, forcing it through the leg side in front of midwicket and wide of mid-on for three runs
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends it watchfully into the off side
airy, fullish on middle and he presents the full face , driving it uppishly over the outstretched hands of the bowler, who doesn't get his fingers to it, and gets it to the boundary
full on the off, driven off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
short of a good length on middle, worked away down towards fine leg for a single to keep the strike
begins with a wide, shortish down the leg side, can't get his bat to it
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it towards extra cover
short of a length outside off, chops it down towards point
well run, pushed it gently down the pitch in front of mid-on, called early and rushed through to complete the single
short of a length outside off and hint of away movement after pitching, shoulders arms to that one

leading edge but fell safe, some late away movement and Kayes, trying to work it through the leg side, closed the face on it a little too early, lobbed up wide of extra cover for a single, lucky escape there
a tempting line outside off, moving away again, shoulders arms to the keeper
lands on a good length on the off, pushed into the off side
gets forward and plays it in the direction of mid-off

aggression, didn't time it as well as he would have liked, short of a good length outside off and he swung it past square leg, Welegedara covered a fair distance running to his right from fine leg and dragged it back
short again, on middle this time, pulled away but straight to the same fielder at a squarish fine leg
bowls it on a good length on the off, pushed wide of mid-on and snatches a quick single
rose up more than he expected, short of a length outside off, went for the cut but the extra bounce just beat the outside edge, bowled at 82 mph
edged and short, bowls it on a good length outside off, drew him forward and he tried to dab at it hard, got a thick outside edge and it landed just short of Kandamby at second slip
hurls it on a good length on middle, defended towards extra cover

appeal for a catch, the Sri Lankans were pretty confident, short on the off, went for the pull and there was a deviation as it went through to the keeper, replays show it just brushed the shoulder, good decision
angling it on the pads and he cashes in, flicking it really fine to beat the fielder at fine leg

dropped, smacked hard on the wrists, full on middle and Tamim absolutely murdered it as he smashed it back to the bowler, Kulasekara tried to take it in front of his face but ended up palming it off towards midwicket, sharp chance
bowls it on a good length on the off, defended towards extra cover
short of a length on the off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off, refuses the single
bowling it on a good length on middle, turns the face and plays it towards midwicket
in the blockhole outside off, reaches and digs it out towards extra cover
lands on a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler
lands on a good length on the off, defended watchfully wide of the pitch
a slog, not there to hit but he backs himself, shortish on the off and he heaves it over square leg, fine leg runs across, dives and drags it back, Tharanga the man, does a good job
bowls it on a good length outside off, shoulders arms to the keeper
shortish on middle, turns it away off the back foot behind square for a single
almost had him there, nipped back in from a good length on the off, got an inside edge onto the pads and landed just short of the keeper
short and wide, cut hard but straight to point where the fielder dives to his left and saves a certain four, who else but Dilshan
bowls it on a good length on middle, pushes it back firmly to the bowler
drifting on the pads and he walks across to tickle it fine, clips the pads down towards fine leg for a couple of runs
short of a good length on the off, rock solid as he moves back and defends it to cover
hurling it on the off stump, pushed back with a straight bat to the bowler
short outside off, pulled away over midwicket, mistimed but there's no one in the deep, a couple more to the score
short of a length outside off, tries to force it off the back foot through cover, misses and is beaten
the field is up and he launches that over mid-on, shortish but he went through with the shot, smacking it over the in-field
goes for another one, lands on a good length and he tries to swing it into the stands over long-on but misses, Sangakkara goes up belatedly, no response from the umpire
plenty of action already in the first few overs, bowled it short and he went for the pull, took his eyes off the ball there and paid the price, was struck on the helmet, no damage done
Tharanga misfields after running to his right from a squarish fine leg, whipped off the back foot and he fumbles to allow it through the ropes, the crowd roars
a rubbish full toss outside off and is dealt with appropriately as Tamim crashes it through point to beat third man, bigger cheers
three in a row, full on middle and leg, in the slot for Tamim who flicks it uppishly over square leg to the ropes
guides it with an open face wide of point for a single
short of a good length on the off, defended in front of cover
hurls it short on middle, drops it into the leg side wide of square leg for a single
targeting middle and off, gets on the back foot to defend, gets an inside edge onto the pads
pushed off the back foot towards cover
bowling it full on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
clipped uppishly wide of that fielder for a single
quicker through the air, bowling it short on the off, pushed towards midwicket
tossed up on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
played away into the leg side off the front foot
short of a good length on middle, pushed towards midwicket
low full toss on the off, punched towards mid-off for a single to raise the fifty-stand
short of a length outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
shortish on leg stump, chipped towards deep square leg for one more
back of a length on middle, pulled away uppishly towards deep square leg, got it a little high on the bat, didn't time it well, just a single
attempted yorker on the off, dug out towards mid-off
short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
angling it towards middle, played back to the bowler
tossed up on the off, comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for a single
drifting down leg and holds its line, gets across to play it fine, misses, so does the keeper and it rolls down the fine-leg boundary, a wide called much to the bowler's disappointment
reaches forward and defends it back to the bowler
gets a big stride out to tap it towards extra cover
short of a length, punched off the back foot to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, whipped off the back foot past midwicket into the deep for a well-run couple
pushed it fuller on middle, turned the face and worked it firmly towards midwicket
short on middle and leg, worked away wide of short fine leg into the deep for a couple more
short of a good length on the off, dabbed it behind point for one more, easily done
gone! Short on the off and was drawn into playing the pull, was targeting square leg but ended up getting a top edge, landed straight into the hands of Samaraweera at fine leg
short of a good length outside off, at 125 kmph, leaves it alone to the keeper
tossed up on the off, pushed gently into the off side
dropped, short of a length outside off, tried to cut it hard past point, got a thick edge and Sangakkara failed to clasp it, a chance gone down
closed the face and defended into the leg side
angling it towards middle from round the wicket, swept firmly past short fine for a couple behind deep square leg
gave it some air and Tamim sensed a chance, rocking forward, bending low and slog-sweeping it over midwicket, the wicket has done nothing to prompt him to slow down

But his lack of restraint has cost him here, had already committed himself to that shot as he charged down the track, Dilshan held back the length just a hint and Tamim tried to launch him over mid-off, got plenty of elevation but not the distance as he didn't connect it well, Lakmal ran back a few steps and judged it to perfection
short of a length outside off, held its line, lets it go
back of a length outside off, again he isn't tempted to play the cut, lets it go
came back in, pushed it full outside off, tried to drive it through the line but the movement beat the flow of the bat
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and drops it in front of the bowler
bouncer, a touch too high, bowled at 130 kmph, opted out of the pull once he realised it was out of his reach

brilliantly taken by Samaraweera, rose up after landing short on the off, tried to play off the back foot with an angled bat, got a thick edge and it was flying past a widish slip but he hurled himself to his right and plucked it one-handed
full on the off, pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
landed on a good length on the off, defended between point and cover for a single
back of a length on the off, gets back and knocks it down onto the pitch
a touch fuller, bowled at 80.5 mph, driven uppishly but on the bounce to mid-on
short of a length outside off, runs it down to third man for single
short and wide, bowled at 78.7 mph, opts out of a cut, leaves it to the keeper
bouncer banged in on middle and off, ducks under it easily
short of a length outside off, doesn't play the cut, the umpire calls it a wide, a little harsh it appeared
hurled it full on the off, driven hard but straight to extra cover
slower one bowled short on the off, cutting away, defended off the back foot onto the pitch

another one goes! Lakmal strikes again, short and wide, goes for the cut and slashes hard while doing it, flies off the outside edge and Welegedara at third man judges it superbly, running forward, diving and taking an excellent low catch
drops it off the back foot into the leg side for a single
bouncer but a touch too high, given a wide
short of a good length on the off, defended off the back foot towards cover
lands on a good length outside off, shoulders arms to allow it through
on middle and leg, worked away wide of square leg for a single
pushed it full on middle, drove it wide of mid-on for one more
short of a good length outside off, moving away a hint, leaves it be
hurls it full outside off, leaving the right hander, allows it through
short of a length, cracks it wide of mid-off for a single
shortish on middle, defended to midwicket from the crease
bowled it full on the off, driven hard and straight and Lakmal does well to bend low and field it off his own bowling
short of a length and he punishes it, slashes it wide of a diving Dilshan at point, he may have got a finger to it but it would be unfair to put it down as a drop, races to the ropes
an excellent bouncer, bowled at 80.5 kmph just outside off, ducks under it well
back of a length on the off, rocks back and guides it towards point
short of a good length on middle, defended off the back foot towards the bowler
tossed up outside off, square-driven past point for a single
pushed off the front foot back to the bowler
tossed it up on the off, gets front and across and pats it back down the pitch
flighted on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
that one didn't turn and beat the outside edge, Ashrafu, expecting it to turn in tried to open the face and was fortunate not to nick it
quicker through the air, flattish, on the off, defended wide of the pitch
slower bouncer and he doesn't pick it, tried to drag it past midwicket but was too early into the shot, looked pretty ugly
sharp bouncer at 130 kmph, gets out of the way with ease
short of a good length on the off, dropped off the back foot in front of the bowler
lands on a good length outside off, pushed through to extra cover
clubbed it, short of a length and smashed it over the bowler's head for a boundary, brave attempt and gave it a mighty swat
shortish on the off, drops it into the leg side off the back foot for just a single
flighted on middle and leg, tried to drive it through the leg side, was struck on the pads but would have missed leg
waited for it to turn in and knocked it towards extra cover
short of a good length on middle, worked into the leg side
fires it short down the leg side, holds its line, called a wide
pitched it up, driven firmly but straight to midwicket
closes the face and turns it just wide of backward short leg for a single
lands on a good length on middle, steps forward and tucks it to midwicket
the extra bounce and the away movement beats him, short of a good length, trying to dab it to third man, misses
takes the risk, goes for the pull to that rising delivery and gets the top edge that beats fine leg, Welegedera could have put in a better effort there
hurled it short on the off, steps back and knocks it in front of point
banged it short on leg stump, ducks under it and it's called a wide, marginal call
short of a good length on middle, worked away past square leg for a single
banged in short on the off, makes way and allows it through
bowls it on a good length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
flighted on middle, turned towards midwicket on the front foot
shortish on the off, jabs it in front of cover to complete a single and raise the 100
flighted on the off, played wristily towards midwicket
shortish on the off, drops it in front of point and races off
flatter, on middle and leg, tickled towards fine leg for one more
tossed up on the off, bends low and sweeps it hard towards deep square leg for a single
struck outside the line as he came forward to defend, stifled appeal turned down
worked away off the back foot past midwicket for a single
tossed up on the off, played watchfully to cover
flatter, bowled short on middle, nudged towards midwicket  and rushed through for a quick single
spun away sharply, chased it initially but was surprised by the spin and pretended to withdraw
flighted on middle, swept down really fine, fine leg takes a while to run across and by the time he returns a strong throw, the batsmen have completed three
short of a length on the off, pulled away towards deep midwicket
gets forward and defends it towards extra cover
turning in from a good length outside off, defended towards extra cover
plenty of air, took it on the half-volley and drove it hard wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
attempts the reverse-paddle and plays it straight to short third
quicker through the air, defended wide of cover for a single
flighted outside off, mistimes a drive towards point
short of a length on the off, dabs it towards point from the crease
flighted on middle, drives it inside out past extra cover for a single
short of a length on middle, punched wide of midwicket and pinches a quick run
flighted outside off, mistimes a drive again, straight to extra cover
shortish on the off, defended towards point
uppish, on middle and leg and he chips it just wide of midwicket
closes the face and nudges it behind square for a single
flighted on the off, driven down the ground towards long-off for one more
swept from outside off towards deep square leg for a single
turns back in from a good length outside off, drops it on the pitch
slow full toss on middle, driven firmly wide of long-on for a couple
on middle, makes a bit of room and drives it towards long-off for one more
bowled flat from wide of the crease, turning away, tries to dab it behind point, misses
lunges forward and plays it back to the bowler
hurled it short on middle, turned behind square for one more
tossed it up on the off, pushed back to the bowler
pushed through towards long-on for a single
waits for it to turn in and then dabs it behind point for a single
went straight on, played for the spin, and like earlier in the innings he was beaten
pushed off the front foot between point and cover for a single
went straight on again, short and wide, made room to cut, missed
flighted on the off, reaches forward and plays it respectfully back to the bowler
flighted, lands on a length and defended to cover
that's Ashraful's first boundary in 37 balls, amazing. Gives himself room, and goes with the spin over extra cover, clean shot
got the width here, but doesn't connect well with the cut
fuller delivery, played towards midwicket
gets the width again, and cuts it towards sweeper-cover for one
paddled away this time, places it well enough for a single
gets across, looks for a big sweep, extra bounce gets a top edge that lands safely at short fine
full delivery, just outside off, defended to cover
strays on the pads, worked away to short fine for a quick single

he has given him, the sweep proves to be Rahim's downfall. He has premeditated the shot, is too far across, and fails to connect. Randiv gets him full on the toe, and the umpire has no doubts regarding this
gets on to the front foot and defends solidly
and paddle sweep again, he connects well this time, and places it well too
drives inside-out, along the ground this time, and gets a single
good length, and gets turn here, just outside off, drawing the batsman forward and beating the poke
straighter delivery this time, and defended back to the bowler
short outside off, and pushed away to sweeper-cover
too full, too straight, and worked away off the pads
takes it from outside off, and wrists it away towards midwicket for one, against the spin
hint of drift, draws him outside off, but Mahmudullah drops it towards cover and takes a sharp single
shorter, flatter, and he takes a single to short third
looks to run this one off the face, but hits it straight to short third
this time looks for a more forceful shot through the covers, the ball breaks in, and he is lucky he hasn't played it on
shorter, gives him time and he pushes it to sweeper-cover

sharp single, risky one actually, straight to short third. Kandamby's throw is over the stumps, but Sangakkara spends an extra half second to take the bails off, which is time enough for Mahmud to dive in full length and save his wicket
short and wide, and dabbed away for a single to deep point
beaten, moving away from the line of the ball and looking to open the face, and plays inside the line
pitched up this time, Mahmud gets forward and across and shoulders arms
and again, the ball is shorter and he looks to run it down and is beaten. A nothing shot really, because there is a slip waiting
this time he goes for the positive full-faced shot and gets much better results. Makes room, takes a back-of-a-length delivery on the up and lofts it over mid-off
is beaten on the pull shot, late into the shot, gets hit on the thigh pad and refuses a leg bye, which could have been risky
gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
this time Ashraful is beaten while trying to dab one to third man
on the pads, turned away to short fine leg for a single
short, turning in, pushed away, but can't beat cover
similar delivery, but hit to the right of cover this time
another short delivery, spinning in towards middle, and Ashraful makes room and cuts it to the left of sweeper-cover for two
thigh-high fulltoss, Mahmud is a bit surprised and plays back to the bowler. Seems he lost his footing in the run-up
short and pulled away to fine leg
yorker, leg-stump line, and played towards midwicket
back of a length, defended towards cover
digs this one in short, pulled away elegantly, but gets just a single to fine leg
another bumper tried, but misses his line and is wided down the leg side
short again, but this one doesn't rise, and is worked away to fine leg
turned off the pads, and they run a sharp single to midwicket
full, almost yorks him, Ashraful is looking to play to leg, gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
gets forward, turns the bat face, and plays it straight towards midwicket
another dot, looks to run it to third man but this is not nearly short enough
this time he dabs it successfully to get a single
moving about in the crease, but in the end gets an accurate delivery, which he bunts to short third and takes a single
starts off with a length ball, around off, and he takes a single to long-off
angling across him, and he shoulders arms to it
just back of a length, middle-stump line, no room, and defended back to the bowler
gets the width, but is beaten on the cut by the low bounce and lack of feet movement. the ball bounces in front of Sanga
gets a half-volley, drives it to wide of long-off, and buys himself time to get a couple
dabs this one down, with the angle, to third man for a single
full and wide down down the leg side
looks to reverse-sweep and almost plays it on to the stumps. High-risk shot anyway, because there is a short third man
goes down the ground this time, and gets a plain vanilla single, risk free
makes room, gets a single to cover
runs it down to short third, with soft hands, and Mahmud is alert when running to the danger end
angling into the pads, and worked off them for a single
lofts inside-out, it's a chip shot really, and gets him a single, one bounce to sweeper-cover
smacked away, long hop asking to be pulled, but he finds deep midwicket, so it's just a single
goes for the yorker, misses the length a little, but it's just a single to sweeper-cover
takes a chance on Dilshan's arms, runs fast, and the throw misses by inches at the non-striker's end. Would have just made it anyway
good bouncer, on the stumps, rising forever, and gives him no room to cut
driven away, but straight to cover, this is turning out to be a good over for SL
yorker, just outside off, dug out, but played straight to Dilshan at backward point
starts with a gentle offbreak, which is worked around the corner for one
flighted, around the off line, and defended
makes room, and gets it past point for single
superb shot, goes inside-out, always good to watch, gets a length delivery, and gets under it, clearing extra cover with ease
follows it up with a shot not so good, goes for the reverse sweep again and misses again. At least thrice it has happened today
Ashraful looking to turn it on now, steps out and goes straight down the ground, wide of long-off and gets two
and the ill-advised reverse-sweep again, connects but hits straight to short third
Worked away with soft hands to short fine leg this time
goes for the cut, and is beaten, it's too full for the shot
fuller, looks for a single on the on side, but finds midwicket

Sanga has missed a run-out here, Mahumullah looks to drop and run, Ashraful is not interested to begin with, but comes through. Mahmudullah has given up by the time, but charges down anyway. Sanga, though, fails to collect it cleanly
starts off with a yorker, just outside off, and he gets a single to third man
back of a length, tucks Ashraful up, and he can't get it off the square

Ashraful finds the boundary again, and gets to his 20th ODI fifty. Short, and at 120ks, it's a gentle bouncer and is pulled away safely to the midwicket boundary. An uncharacteristic, hard-working fifty
another bouncer, this is sharper, but too high
this is in the Ashraful region, length ball, perfect length for him to play his pick-up shot over the on-side field. He is looking purposeful now
low fulltoss on the pads, he will get just a single to long-on, off the toe end of the bat
this fulltoss gets the treatment, though, too much on the pads, and he gets under it and lofts it over midwicket. Superb over for Bangladesh, 15 off
starts off round the wicket, angling across the batsman, Ashraful gets a single to cover
stays round the wicket, with a strong off-side field, and another single ensues, again to sweeper-cover
Ashraful waits and waits and before opening the face of the bat, but third man is there
similar ploy, this time he looks to go in front of sweeper-cover, Silva at extra cover fumbles, and they get two
strays off the plan, and bowls a wide down the leg side
looks to walk across and expose the leg-side field, connects but finds Kandamby at short fine leg
goes back to the plan, full and wide of off, and a driven single to sweeper-cover
he tries that, looks to make room, but Randiv follows him, an inside edge gets the batsman a single
full and fast down the leg side, and he gets enough bat on it to beat short fine leg and get four
good running, plays with soft hands off the pads, and calls for two early and gets back before the deep backward square leg can get around
looks to cramp him up again, and bowls a wide down the leg side
goes for the big heave and misses
goes for the sweep, misses the ball rolls off the pad and he gets a single
looks for the paddle/scoop over short fine, but this is too far outside off for him to connect. Smart bowling
driven powerfully, but straight to sweeper-cover. Kula won't mind that, he is having the batsmen play where he wants them to
goes for the big shot over the on side, gets an inside edge and takes a single to short fine
and again, powerful drive, but straight to long-off
opens up, looks to go over on side, but Kula gets a perfect yorker in, outside off
and again, full and wide outside off, and played straight to the deep fielder at cover. Good bowling, just five off
this is a wide down the leg side, but Ashraful sweeps and finds the short fine leg
big slog sweep, connects handsomely, finds the gap between the two deep fielders on the leg side. Anyway he didn't need the gap, this is connected well enough to clear the fence

literally down and out as another man falls to the sweep. Decides belatedly to sweep, the ball dips and misses the bat as he falls over and is hit on the back pad in front of the stumps (down). The umpire has no choice but to lift the finger to this plumb lbw (out)
works away the first ball he faces to short fine
good shot, goood shot, the leg-side field is strong, so he makes room crashes it through the extra-cover gap, all along the ground
makes room again, but can;t go over extra this time, and gets a single to mid-off
nice shot, this time he breaches the on-side field, gets across, and scoops a length delivery short fine
corrects his mistake, doesn't get close to the stumps, bowls wide, and Ashraful drives straight to sweeper-cover

Ashraful is gone, big blow, even though only nine balls are to go, Naeem goes for the big heave, misses, Sanga fumbles as it bounces in front of him, Ashraful wants the bye, but Sanga recovers well and hits the stumps direct to find Ashraful inches short
gets a dot  ball with a bouncer, just outside off, and Razzak is late into the pull
another bouncer, pulls unconvincingly, and gets a single to midwicket
goes back to the round-the-wicket plan to the right-hand batsman, and gives away just a single to long-off
good effective shot, Lakmal is looking for a yorker, ends up bowling a low fulltoss, and he gets across and swipes it over midwicket
that's a biggie, lovely shot, they are dancing in the aisles in Dhaka, back of a length, and he sits back, waits and pulls it over the midwicket boundary
ho ho ho, Naeem is on fire here, he has set the crowd into a frenzy, another bouncer, and again he clears his front leg, and pulls, straighter this time, but clears long-on
finally gets the yorker right, but he digs it out towards cover and hares back for two, he doesn't want anyone else to take strike
length ball, outside off, driven powerfully to sweeper-cover, refuses the single, interesting
fulltoss, high, but this time he doesn't connect well enough, yet they scamper through for two to wide of long-on

inn2.comm: starts off his international career with a short-pitched delivery that tucks Tharanga up
spanked away, gets width this time, and crashes it through point, too easy for the man in form
nice high-arm action, stays short, no width this time, 135ks, played to on side
no-ball, crashed through the covers. Not a bad ball, length ball, slight width and he punches it through covers, and not a soul moved on the off side
free hit, goes for too powerful a shot, doesn't connect properly, gets a single to wide of mid-off
good delivery, nice length, shaping in, no room, driven back to the bowler
slightly slower, Dilshan waits and punches it towards point, where Shakib makes a diving save
another crunchy shot into the off side, but this time straight to point, he is timing them superbly
tries too hard for pace, and misdirects down the leg side
down the leg side again, Tharanga misses out, but it hits the pad and flies past Mushfiq for leg-byes
stays on the pads again, is lucky that the flick finds the fielder at midwicket
full ball across him, he drives but doesn't get the timing right
that's well bowled, back of a length, neither driveable nor cuttable, Tharanga pokes and misses
goes too hard at the drive, and gets the inside part of the bat back towards the bowler
poor delivery, too short, going down the leg side, Dilshan pulls, actually helps it along the way, crashing through to the fine-leg boundary
slower ball, and Dilshan waits and works it towards fine leg
tries another bouncer, this one stays low, beats Tharanga, and bounces short and wide of Mushfiqur, who dives but can't save four byes
tucks him up this time, but he works it towards square leg for one
that says, hit me, and hit does Dilshan, going past 4000 runs in ODIs. poor delivery, short, too short, at 125ks, and he smashes it to the square-leg boundary
fuller this time, plays it to wide of mid-on and comes through for one
good ball, almost a yorker, just outside off, and dug out well
back of a length, punched away towards cover
too short again, this time it hurries onto Dilshan, hence it's just a single to square leg
fulltoss, outside off, and he plays it with an open face, bisecting backward point and cover-point
Bangladesh get their first wicket, it's angled across Tharanga who goes for the big lofted shot, and is done in by the angle, getting an outside edge through to the keeper
good length delivery outside off, Sanga lets it through, Mushfiqur is all charged up behind the stumps
a text-book forward defensive, yes Dilshan does that sometimes, he doesn't have any room this time
length ball, driven on the up, can't beat mid-off
slower bouncer, 128ks, he is too early into the shot, and is hit in the helmet. Good stuff this
what a response, the crowd is stunned into silence, length ball on the pads, he clears the front leg and heaves it over midwicket
back of a length, around off, punched away, but can't beat cover, little room there
tough chance dropped, Dilshan crashes it straight back, to the left of Shafiul who gets a left hand to it, would have been sensational had it stuck
there's the Sanga touch, caress is the word, back of a length, meets it with an open face, and it flies along the outfield, right of point
back of a length, not much room here, and defended towards cover
poor delivery this time, down the leg side, Sangakkara misses, but the thigh-pad contact is good enough to get his four leg-byes
full and wide, and it is treated with disdain, Sangakkara gets forward and across and drives it beautifully through point
back of a length again, outside off, and he lets it go through
length ball, driven wide of mid-off, and they come through for one
starts off with a flat delivery, outside off, pushed to point
another flat delivery, and cut away to wide of point for a single
flighted and straight, defended respectfully
quicker but down the leg side, Dilshan misses but gets a leg-bye
flighted delivery, around off, driven to mid-off
flatter, 95ks, hurries him into a defensive shot
into the pads, worked away to square leg for one
shot, lovely shot, this is a packed off-side field, Sanga gets on a knee and caresses a length delivery through the field. No power, all timing and placement
pulls the length back a bit, and he pushes it towards cover
fuller delivery, driven down the ground, to mid-on
over-stepping again, full and wide, doesn't connect properly but knows he will get a free hit now
length ball, outside off, and he lofts it over point, simple as they come
tighter delivery this time, shorter, closer to off, and he defends it towards cover
good running, driven to wide of long-off, and there is an early call
driven down the ground again, straight to long-off time, gets a single
nicely driven through the covers with soft hands, and steals a couple before it can reach the sweeper-cover
floated wide outside off, Sanga looks to cut but pulls out
onto the pads and worked away for a single
into the pads, and he misses out non the flick
flat on off stump, and punched down the ground for one
and is crashed through the covers first ball, driven with an open face, superb shot again
flat, and on the stumps, and played back to the bowler
driven with an open face again, this time cover gets a hand to it, and keeps them to one
flighted outside off, gets onto the front foot and defends
looks to bunt it to mid-on and run, but Shakib is quick and creates doubt
fired down the leg side, Sanga sweeps and gets enough bat to beat short fine
flat delivery, no room, and is hurried into a defensive shot
another flat delivery, and pushed to cover-point
into the pads, looks for the flick, but short midwicket is in
slows it down this time, Dilshan waits, and defends toward short midwicket
flat delivery now, and is punched through to sweeper-cover for one
slow, nicely flighted, hit towards midwicket
fulltoss, driven down to long-off for single
well bowled, flighted outside off, doesn't turn in and beats Sanga's poke
it's flighted again, and Sanga defends it towards cover
flatter, into the pads, and turned away to midwicket
another flat delivery, Sanga can't get it past Shakib when looking for a single to long-on
good tight over, flat and on the stumps again, and played straight to midwicket
flighted, but way down the leg side
flatter this time, and Dilshan waits for it and punches it wide of sweeper-cover for two
down the leg side again, and Dilshan misses out on the sweep
and again he misses out on a leg-side offering, but gets a single to short fine leg
driven down the ground for an easy single
on the stumps, no room here, and played back to the bowler
into the pads, and he is watchful again
easy single down the ground again
into the pads, and Dilshan's sweep finds the short fine leg fielder again
sharp single to short third man, it is a late cut, and unhesitating call sees them through without trouble
Dilshan is cramped for the room again, and ends up playing towards midwicket
fired in around the off stump, and pushed back to the bowler
Dilshan looks to come down, yorks himself, and plays it back to Shakib
starts off his second spell with a length delivery outside, which is dabbed towards point
shout for lbw but it is clearly sliding down the leg side
looks to drive it through the covers, but it isn't full enough and ends up playing it towards cover
skidding short delivery, Dilshan looks for the pull but is beaten because of the extra pace
punched on the up, dead straight, disturbs the stumps at the non-striker's end
this time the punch goes wide of the stumps and they get a single to long-off
worked away towards sweeper-cover for a single
that will ease it a bit for Sanga, a rare poor delivery from Shakib, short and wide and is caressed through point for four
half-volley and is driven down the ground for one
clever running, drops and runs, just to the left of cover, calling is clear, running is quick
and another boundary. Is it the dew? he has dragged back the length and given him enough room to cut it, and Sanga is harsh on such deliveries
another boundary and the flood gates have opened again, just casually stands tall, and drives it through the covers. There is a sweeper-cover in place, but he goes to the right of him
a crunchy pull shot, and Mahmud makes a lunging save at the deep square leg boundaru, it is superbly connected and Mahmud has to hurry up to keep them to one
goes for the bouncer, and it's too high
driven handsomely, but straight to  mid-off
draws a flase shot from Sanga, it's just the angle that takes the ball away from Sanga and he is beaten on the drive
wonderful shot this time, it's not a bad delivery, pitched back of a length, going across him, and he nonchalantly drives it between mid-off and extra cover
turns a yorker into a low fulltoss and drives it wide of sweeper-cover
has he stumped him? no he hasn't, umpire Gould doesn't go upstairs even. Dilshan is beaten on the big drive, drags his foot out and gets it back in time
looks to drive towards long-on, gets a leading edge towards long-off
full and straight, played towards midwicket
flatter this time, and is worked into the point-coverpoint gap
angled into the pads, goes onto the backfoot and works it away towards square leg
driven gracefully to wide of long-off, will get a comfortable two
back of a length, punched to cover, and they get an overthrow because Razzak doesn't collect it cleanly
fuller delivery, driven back to the bowler
slows this one down and flights it well, played back to the bowler
quicker one now, 91ks, Dilshan is slightly late into it and doesn't get power into the punch
slower again, around off, no room, and he plays it towards point
into the pads this time, and he helps it around the corner for one
flighted around off, driven, but straight to cover
too straight this time, and he gets an easy single towards square leg
again no room, flighted around off, and it's defended back to the bowler
and again no width at all, skidding on too, and Sanga is a touch late in the drive
driven down the ground for an easy single
superb shot here, waits for this shortish delivery to turn in towards off, and opens the face of the bat late and beats backward point
driven with an open face towards deep point
into the pads, and he plays it towards midwicket
gently flighted on the pads, and he drives it down the ground to get a single that gets him his 50
steps out and drives, but finds midwicket
short and pulled away to wide of long-on, Tamim makes a good diving save and keeps him down to two, which take Sanga to 50 too
gently worked away into the leg side for a single
flighted around the leg-stump line, played back to the bowler
drives it down to long-on and gets a single
short and crashed away through the covers, too easy for Dilshan
invites a big shot through the loop here, Dilshan goes for it, but is beaten by the straighter delivery
goes for an easy single down the ground and gets it
into the pads, plays it around the corner and gets a single
easily driven down the ground for another single
fired in down the leg side, gets away with it
driven on the up, but can't beat cover
arm ball, and Dilshan gets the inside half of the bat but is safe
good comeback from Dilshan, gets to the pitch of this ball, makes room and pierces the off-side field, between cover and cover-point
yorks him there, played back to the bowler
driven on the up, but straight towards cover
strays onto the pads, an easy single ensues
straighter topspinner, Dilshan read it and went towards cover, where a diving Shakib saved four
flighted up this time, driven against the turn but can't beat cover
driven to wide of long-off for one
into the pads, turned around the corner towards short fine where Razzak slips because of the dew and one becomes three
flat delivery, pushed down the ground for a single
into the pads, played away with soft hands towards deep midwicket
goes for the drive into the off side, gets the inside edge towards midwicket
flat ball, 89ks, and pushed down the ground
looking to cramp him but goes too far down the leg side
steps out, drives powerfully, can't beat extra cover
another sharp chance goes down, it's hit high to the left of Shakib, who gets air-borne and gets a hand to it, would have been a good catch
lovely drive, gets on a knee, is close to the pitch, and threads it through the gap between mid-off and extra cover
tries the same shot, but gets too square this time and hits straight to extra cover
leans back and pushes this one straight down the ground
another wide down the leg side, too many of those today
stays on the pads again, and is flicked away for a single
another offering outside leg, and Sanga receives it with gratitude, and sweeps it to long-leg boundary
there is a shout for lbw here, but bowling from round the stumps he doesn't get it to straighten enough
flighted outside off, hit straight to backward point
gets his front leg out of the day, and drives it down the ground
nicely tossed up, Sanga presses forward and defends
on the pads, and gets flicked away for a single
overpitched, Dilshan looks to crash it through the covers, times well, but can't beat extra cover
arm ball, Dilshan is hurried into it because of the angle but gets a single down to long-off
looks to blast the first delivery away, but doesn't get the timing right
slower ball, sees it early, and waits and waits before cutting it square of third man
back of a length, into the pads, pushed to mid-on
good bouncer, aimed at his face, and he pulls out of a pull shot
overpitched, and driven powerfully to the right of sweeper-cover
angled across Sanga, who runs it down off the face of his bat
arm ball, beats him outside off stump
flighted on the pads and worked away for a single
pushed away to long-off and gets a single
tossed up gently, Sanga presses forward and defends
dances down the wicket and drives it down the ground for one
and another gift down the leg side has been encashed, it's fired in, all Dilshan has to do is get some bat on it and beat short fine, which he does

finally second success wicket for Bangladesh, Shafiul gets his first international wicket. It's a soft dismissal really, it's on offcutter dug in short, Sanga looks to open the face of his bat and gets an outside edge
full delivery, on off-stump line, defended towards mid-on
a misfield at the fine-leg boundary by Rubel, the ball just kept sliding along the dew and he didn't get low enough, it was a nice gentle tuck from Samaraweera to get off the mark
on the stumps, Samaraweera gets across and works it into the leg side, with soft hands so he can come back for two
again he moves across and gets a single to fine leg
slower bouncer, Dilshan sees it coming and rolls his wrists on the pull and gets a single to fine leg
throws it up wide, inviting the big drive, Dilshan connects but can't get it through extra cover
flatter this time, and is pushed down the ground
presses forward and defends into the covers
again gets a stride in and defends
arm ball, 53mph, cleverly bowled, beats Samaraweera, just missing leg stump, hence a stifled shout
slower onto the pads, defended into the leg side
bunts it into the leg side and comes through for one
arm ball, 89ks, Samaraweera is more alert this time
slows it down this time, 82ks, Samaraweera plays for the non-existent turn and gets an inside edge onto the pad
dances down the track, gets too close to the pitch and drives it towards cover
another arm ball, another stifled lbw shout because it is going down the leg side
shimmies down, and drives to mid-on
looks to run it down with an open face, but it's too close to him
pushes it down the ground for a single
looks to come down the track, sees a short delivery, stays back and gets a single to long-on
arm ball, on the stumps, Dilshan plays it towards cover
slower in the air, driven down the ground and gets one
steps out and again gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and plays it towards midwicket
down the leg side and he clips it down to deep square leg
stays back and punches it to mid-on
quicker and flatter, he chops it to cover point
gives him the charge and forces it down the pitch to the bowler
skids through, he makes room and cuts to the offside
chips down the track and he doesn't offer a shot, pads it away
punches it firmly back to the bowler
a little wide and he reaches out and chops it down
this one comes through straight, he places it just wide of short third man
goes back and punches it through the line to long-on
drops it short, he goes back and places it to deep point
flighted on the pads and clipped to midwicket
cut away, but straight to cover-point
strays onto the pads, and is worked away for a single
quicker delivery, Samaraweera goes back and cuts it towards sweeper-cover
slips while sweeping, and has hurt himself again. He is in pain, but gets back up
shorter and flatter, and pushed towards wide long-on
onto the pads again, and he gets an easy single to square leg
on the pads again, and he misses out on the sweep shot
way, way down the leg side, close to being a Test-match wide
comfortable driven down the ground for one
short, straight, pushed down the ground for one
again short and straight, and again pushed to long-off
short into the pads, and pushed down to long-on this time
fulltoss on the pads, hit to wide of long-on for one
pays for the spin again, and has to change the shot at the last moment, and drive it back to the bowler
flat and short, lucky that the cut shot doesn't beat a diving short third man
pitched up and driven down to long-off
dances down the track and bunts this one towards long-on
short and flat again, and crunched away towards sweeper-cover for one
back of a length, powerfully driven, but can't beat point
overpitched, almost a yorker, and driven to mid-on
full delivery, driven with open face for a single
flicked away off the pads, will get a single
short and pulled away emphatically, through the gap between mid-on and midwicket
fuller delivery, driven to wide of long-off, gets to within three of century
flat delivery into the pads, looks to turn it away for one but can't get it into the gap
short and asking to be hit, and that's what he does, cleanly over midwicket
pushes forward and drives it back to the bowler
dances down the track and drives it down to long-on
thrown up, and powerfully punched to the right of sweeper-cover
well flighted, looks to turn it to leg, gets a leading edge into the covers
on the pads, watchfully defended to leg
chips down the track and pushes it down to long-on
that's the first ODI hundred of the decade, thrown up gently outside off, and he drives it with an open face past point. Removes his cap and salutes the dressing room. Both arms aloft
short and wide down the leg side
short again, punched towards cover where Tamim fumbles and allows a single
beaten outside off, playing for the turn again, and the ball goes on straight
pulled away wide of long-on where Razzak dives but can't prevent four
driven down the ground where long-off is stationed
gets forward, and drives it back to the bowler
steps out, the bowler shortens the length and beats him in the flight
steps out again, gets to the pitch of it, and plays a chip shot over midwicket
and Dilshan goes, goes for the pull shot, is hurried into it by the skidding ball, and can't get it over midwicket where Naeem takes a nice overhead catch
flighted outside off, gets onto the front foot and defends
quicker delivery, stays low too, defended back to the bowler
another short ball, this time Samaraweera is up to it, and rocks back and cuts it for four
turning into the pads, and helped away to square leg for one
turned around the corner for another single
gets onto the front foot and flicks it past fine leg for one
tossed up outside off, defended back towards the bowler
fulltoss and driven down the ground
looks to cut but it is too full and gets the bottom edge for a single to short third man
turned around the corner and a fumble at short fine leg, by Rubel, allows them come through for one
flighted but into the pads, and worked away for another single
flat and full, driven down the ground for one
flighted, just outside off, and defended into the covers
drives it down to long-on and gets a one
into the pads and worked away for a single
short, turning in, can't get it past cover
another wide down the leg side here, and not by a short margin
short, hurries him into the shot, is played back to the bowler
there it is, this time he goes back and punches this back-of-a-length delivery through covers and gets Sri Lanka home with 5.1 overs to spare
